neural

Class Network

  • java.lang.Object
    • neural.Network

  • public class Network
extends java.lang.Object
    A feed-forward network with input, hidden, and output layers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Network(int in, int hid, int out) 

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) AbstractNeuron getNeuron(int layer, int index)
      Returns the specified neuron.
      double meanSquaredError(double[][] inputs, double[][] correct)
      Returns the sum, over a set of training examples and across all outputs, of the square of the difference between actual and correct outputs.
      double[] run(double[] inputs)
      Feeds inputs through the network, updating the output of each neuron.
      java.lang.String toString() 
      void train(double[][] inputs, double[][] correct, int epochs)
      Modifies this network's weights to cause it to respond to inputs with something closer to the correct outputs.
      (package private) void train(double[] inputs, double[] correct)
      Slightly modifies this network's weights to cause it to respond to inputs with something closer to the correct outputs.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Network

        public Network(int in,
       int hid,
       int out)
        Parameters:
        in - Number of input neurons.
        hid - Number of hidden neurons.
        out - Number of output neurons.

    • Method Detail

      • getNeuron

        AbstractNeuron getNeuron(int layer,
                       int index)
        Returns the specified neuron. The input layer is layer 0, hidden 1, output 2.

      • meanSquaredError

        public double meanSquaredError(double[][] inputs,
                      double[][] correct)
        Returns the sum, over a set of training examples and across all outputs, of the square of the difference between actual and correct outputs. If learning is working properly, this should decrease over the course of training.

      • run

        public double[] run(double[] inputs)
        Feeds inputs through the network, updating the output of each neuron.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • train

        void train(double[] inputs,
         double[] correct)
        Slightly modifies this network's weights to cause it to respond to inputs with something closer to the correct outputs.
        Parameters:
        inputs - The attributes of the point on which the network is training.
        correct - The correct outputs for the point on which the network is training.

      • train

        public void train(double[][] inputs,
         double[][] correct,
         int epochs)
        Modifies this network's weights to cause it to respond to inputs with something closer to the correct outputs.
        Parameters:
        inputs - The attributes of each point on which the network is training.
        correct - The correct outputs for each point on which the network is training.
        epochs - Number of passes through the training data to make.
